name: Phenom Projection as Strike
effect: The Base Value of your offensive Phenom Projection is the same as your Base Strike Value.

name: Phenom Projection as Block or Dodge
effect: The Base Value of your defensive Phenom Projection is the same as your Base Block or Dodge Value.

name: Phenom Projection as Spell Projection
effect: The Base Value of Phenom Projection is the same as your Base Spell Projection Value.
